page.title: 14Schools
page.content: There are 3 primary schools in our area. Chilcompton has seperate Church of England Infant and Junior schools and Stratton has a Church of England Primary School. There also used to be a Roman Catholic Primary school in Stratton but this was rebuilt on the edge of Midsomer Norton. A lot of the children who go there are taken by car or by bus. The village schools are all old buildings. Each one has three classes. We do lots of exciting things like cooking, gardening, pottery, sewing, woodwork as well as science, maths, English and computer studies. We have lots of visits to places about the topics we do. At the age of 11 we go to Secondary Schools. Downside R.C.School is a large private school. Their students come from all over the world.
